name: Bounce Attack (vcesauron)
description:
Bounce Attack is an homage to "action" match-3 games Panel de Pon, Tetris Attack etc, but instead of blocks, you're swapping bouncy physics-driven spheres.

Basic instructions:

  • Move your cursor with WASD, press Spacebar to swap spheres
  • As customary with Tetris Attack, you can swap one sphere with "nothing", essentially dragging it to the side and allowing it to fall
  • You lose when a column reaches the top of the screen (it only counts if the sphere stays still for long enough)

That's all! Use and abuse physics glitches to score more points, it's part of the fun.

** ISSUES **: I believe the most annoying issue is regarding the black bars cause by resolution errors. Try ALT+Enter a couple of times to see if it's fixed. There are other bugs I've encountered but didn't have the time to fix. I bet there are a million others that I don't know, so please play and tell me about them!

I hope you have fun playing. Tell me about your highest scores! My current one is 1930.
